## isDate() function

Tests if a value is a date

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function _isDate(aValue: any): aValue is Date;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  aValue | <code>any</code> | the value |

<b>Returns:</b>

`aValue is Date`

true if the value is date, else false
